title: Security play update is not updating to July 2020
content:
Security play update is not updating to July 2020

My Google Play system update in settings>security>Google Play system update is colour red and shows may 2020 update.

When doing the check for update. It checks and shows system is up to date and with Google Play system update of may 2020.

My phone system is up to date with Google July 2020 update.

Your support person Stella is asking me to send for repair which I denied because of below 2 reasons.

1. It's brand new 1 month old device.
2. I don't have any spare device to use.

It's some problem related to software and I don't understand the logic of repairs here.

Either you send some software updates to correct this issue or send me a new replacement device.
